languages.text: "Мы с тобой, элантах, смотрим на этот мир совершенно по-разному. И я вижу много больше его граней, и глубже смыслы, и ярче цвета... Но чтобы облечь всю истину этого мира в скупой язык, привычный твоему слуху, мне понадобится время. Позже я сама приду к тебе с ответом".

"You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."
languages.original_text: "Мы с тобой, элантах, смотрим на этот мир совершенно по-разному. И я вижу много больше его граней, и глубже смыслы, и ярче цвета... Но чтобы облечь всю истину этого мира в скупой язык, привычный твоему слуху, мне понадобится время. Позже я сама приду к тебе с ответом".

But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

languages.text: «Tú y yo, elantach, vemos este mundo de formas muy diferentes. Yo percibo muchas más facetas, significados más profundos y colores más vivos en él... pero plasmar la verdad de este mundo en toda su plenitud utilizando tu escuálido lenguaje llevará tiempo. Te buscaré luego para darte una respuesta».
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: «Tú y yo, elantach, vemos este mundo de formas muy diferentes. Yo percibo muchas más facetas, significados más profundos y colores más vivos en él... pero plasmar la verdad de este mundo en toda su plenitud utilizando tu escuálido lenguaje llevará tiempo. Te buscaré luego para darte una respuesta».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前と我では、この惑星をまったく異なる視点から見ている。我はより多面的に見つめ、より深い意味を汲み取り、より彩り豊かに見えているが…お前が聞きなれている限定的な唖言語でこの惑星の完全な真実を伝えようとすると時間がかかってしまう。また後ほど、お前の問いに答えたい」
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前と我では、この惑星をまったく異なる視点から見ている。我はより多面的に見つめ、より深い意味を汲み取り、より彩り豊かに見えているが…お前が聞きなれている限定的な唖言語でこの惑星の完全な真実を伝えようとすると時間がかかってしまう。また後ほど、お前の問いに答えたい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，你我看待世界的方式截然不同，外界人。在这种不同之中，我会看到更多的角度、更深的含义以及更亮的色彩……不过，若是要我以你们匮乏的语言来捕捉这个世界的全部真实，我恐怕还需要些时间。我会在这之后给你个答复。”
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你我看待世界的方式截然不同，外界人。在这种不同之中，我会看到更多的角度、更深的含义以及更亮的色彩……不过，若是要我以你们匮乏的语言来捕捉这个世界的全部真实，我恐怕还需要些时间。我会在这之后给你个答复。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous et moi percevons ce monde de façons très différentes, elantach. J'en distingue bien plus de facettes, de sens profonds et de couleurs vives... Mais il va me falloir du temps pour parvenir à exprimer la pleine vérité de ce monde dans la langue limitée qui est familière à vos oreilles. Je vous donnerai une réponse plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: « Vous et moi percevons ce monde de façons très différentes, elantach. J'en distingue bien plus de facettes, de sens profonds et de couleurs vives... Mais il va me falloir du temps pour parvenir à exprimer la pleine vérité de ce monde dans la langue limitée qui est familière à vos oreilles. Je vous donnerai une réponse plus tard. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr und ich, Elantach, wir sehen diese Welt auf sehr unterschiedliche Weise. Und ich sehe sehr viel mehr Facetten und eine tiefere Bedeutung und hellere Farben darin ... Doch es wird dauern, die ganze Wahrheit dieser Welt in der geizigen Sprache zu beschreiben, die Euren Ohren vertraut ist. Ich komme später mit einer Antwort zu Euch."
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr und ich, Elantach, wir sehen diese Welt auf sehr unterschiedliche Weise. Und ich sehe sehr viel mehr Facetten und eine tiefere Bedeutung und hellere Farben darin ... Doch es wird dauern, die ganze Wahrheit dieser Welt in der geizigen Sprache zu beschreiben, die Euren Ohren vertraut ist. Ich komme später mit einer Antwort zu Euch."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

languages.text: "Elantach, ikimiz bu dünyaya çok farklı açılardan bakıyoruz. Ben daha pek çok mekân, daha derin manalar ve daha parlak renkler görüyorum. Senin bu dünyanın tüm hakikatine hâkim olman ise kulaklarının aşina olduğu, o pek de zengin olmayan dilde biraz zaman alacak. İleride sana bu hususta bir cevabım olacak."
languages.original_text: "You and I, elantach, look at this world in very different ways. And I see many more facets, and deeper meanings, and brighter colours in it... But to capture the full truth of this world in the miserly language familiar to your ears will take time. I will come to you with an answer later."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, ikimiz bu dünyaya çok farklı açılardan bakıyoruz. Ayrıca benim açımdan daha pek çok mekân, daha derin manalar ve daha parlak renkler de görünüyor. Ancak senin adına bu dünyanın tüm hakikatine hâkim olmak, kulaklarının aşina olduğu o pek de zengin olmayan dilde biraz zaman alacak. İleride sana bu hususta bir cevabım olacak."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
